intro.title: Ali Sahibi, aspiring software engineer
intro.whoami: I have recently graduated with a bachelor of science degree in computer engineering from KTH and I am looking for opportunities to further develop and learn as an engineer.
intro.interests: My interests are primarily in web development, both backend and frontend development. However, my field of interest within programming and computer science is quite wide and I enjoy learning new things.

skills.languages: Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, C, Elixir, Python, SQL (Postgres), HTML, CSS, SCSS
